ygData.subject: Re: Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Another case of not thinking about what others need. You are probably a High Elf, and fail to see that human wizards need this spell, as they can t see in
ygData.messageBody:
Mike Calhoun wrote:
>
> From: Mike Calhoun <ninxf@...>
>
> I think that only getting spells every 4 lvls is stupid. I think that
> we (or everybody) should get spells every lvl or every other lvl.
> Especially for wizards. My friend who is a lvl 5 enchanter almost has
> more spells then I do. They gave us so many useless spells. Like the
> low lvl Sphere of light.

Another case of not thinking about what others need. You are probably a
High Elf, and fail to see that human wizards need this spell, as they
can't see in the night.

--
Sergey
